Posts.Content: If you are on tamoxifen and you are bleeding call dr asap this should not happen they might want to make sure its your period and not something else so please call dr might be normal but we women now must take every thing serious so that we dont get so comfortable as to not pay attention and thats why we have these doctors
Posts.Title: My period came back???

Posts.Content: HI Just tell your sister to find a doctor in her network that might also work in this facility and the doctor can tell insurance company this is most experienced facility to handle her case sometimes this helps cause the doctor say they want particular centers or hospitals or sometimes center will just accept out of network coverage but you also should call insurance get supervisor and plead with them tell them your life depends on this
Posts.Title: HMO and out-of-network coverage

Posts.Content: yes i know i had a reduction with my lumpectomy to be simetrical on both sides and i was bigger than needed anyway but didnt want this disease to get it and people say to me well you wanted that done anyway and if they only had a clue what they just said but i only can say do i think they r mean spirited comments no i think there clueless ones and they dont understand how it affects the ones who dont have choices
Posts.Title: comments

Posts.Content: Been 2 years for me and I still cry But I think its my coping mechanism  so maybe it will stop and maybe not its how you deal with it that counts we all loose a part of ourselves with this disease and I dont think crying is a problem it sometimes is a release of anxiety so good luck be well
Posts.Title: When does the crying stop

Posts.Content: Been 2 years for me and I still cry But I think its my coping mechanism  so maybe it will stop and maybe not its how you deal with it that counts we all loose a part of ourselves with this disease and I dont think crying is a problem it sometimes is a release of anxiety so good luck be well
Posts.Title: When does the crying stop

Posts.Content: wow I dont care what they go through as well as us we are not looking for replacements you stick it out with the ones you love no matter what sorry for being so harsh but the truth is that is unacceptable behavior and im sorry
Posts.Title: husband signed up to online dating

Posts.Content: wow I dont care what they go through as well as us we are not looking for replacements you stick it out with the ones you love no matter what sorry for being so harsh but the truth is that is unacceptable behavior and im sorry
Posts.Title: husband signed up to online dating

Posts.Content: hello no life is different as we new it but staying strong and positive matters i have learned to stop waisting time on the unimportant things focus on the good and learn to let others help you when you need it keep the gloves on and beat the heck out of this beast the women on this site are very kind considerate and caring inspirational as well good luck hope you feel well
Posts.Title: life changing

Posts.Content: this was a prayer stone my sister bought for me and my neice had it blessed so let me share it with all of you Glorious Saint Agatha patroness of those who suffer from breast cancer I call upon you and seek your help please intercede for those afflicted with breast cancer obtain for them comfort during sufferings strength when they feel weary hope when they feel discouraged and joy when they are downhearted help them know the peace of Jesus and the certainty of his victory in their suffering through Christ our Lord Amen I hope this goes out to all regardless of what faith we are prayers can never hurt you only help I carry this stone with me where ever i go
Posts.Title: a prayer for all

Posts.Content: Anybody ever get week feeling and have trouble breathing I had a very strange thing happen today second treatment got realy weird feeling while treatment was going then rest of day noticed breathing was a little more labored then usual and alittle more chest discomfort they dont seem to think it was from rads but i definitely do only happened in treatment just wondering if anyone else had this happen and if so what did u do Thanks deeb
